snippet.title: Project TH(무당) Official Reveal Trailer (2022)
snippet.description:
Project TH Discord : https://discord.gg/project-th

Project TH is an action adventure game that is currently under developing by EVR Studio.

Based on the webtoon ‘Moodang’ IP, Project TH sets scenes in the Unified Nation of Korea in the near future. The scenario focuses on various events cause among the main characters - Ji Jeong Tae, originally a North Korean soldier who comes to South Korea as a militray exchange program participant, Gavi, a member of a rising K-Pop star called ‘ORDO’, and a mysterious terrorist who is known as ‘ID: Ghost’.

The ‘Project TH' consists of numerous cinematic visualizations based on scenarios and narratives that fully packed with infiltration/combat actions with third-person point of view.

Project TH - 'Moodang'
"Moodang", in Korean, means a person who has ability to convey God’s messages and distribute them to the world.
In this work, God stands for those men with political power and Moodang stands for those people who suffer from Gods' play and ultimately portrays nothing but ourselves.

TH uses here as an abbreviation for Two Hearts.
TH implies the meaning of two separated countries with two different political beliefs, the Korean Peninsula.
